pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dedicated 'ggplot2' Methods for 'fixest' Objects // Provides 'ggplot2' equivalents of fixest::coefplot() and fixest::iplot(), for producing nice coefficient plots and interaction plots. Enables some additional functionality and convenience features, including grouped multi-'fixest' object faceting and programmatic updates to existing plots (e.g., themes and aesthetics).
